__e: She was in cahoots with someone and they kidnapped you together?
If you tell us the location of the accomplices and the explosives - we'll let you go.
So now, I have enough money, I have my accomplices, I have somewhat of a plan.
I know I can't tell them about the experiment or the people who died without making them accomplices.
